description: This file defines LightningJS components for rendering a list of notes (`NoteList`) and individual note items (`NoteListItem`). It includes component logic, data binding, event handling, and styling, facilitating user interactions like selecting, deleting, and creating notes within a front-end application.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: A Lightning component representing a single note item, displaying note title, last updated date, and delete button, with support for focus and selection interactions.

classes.name: NoteList
classes.description: A Lightning component that manages and displays a list of notes, handles data fetching via a dataProvider, and allows creating, focusing, and deleting notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the list of notes from the dataProvider and updates the list display.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets up the click handler for the 'Create Note' button to trigger note creation.

methods.name: onFocus
methods.description: Handles focus logic, directing focus to the create button if the list is empty.

methods.name: onUp
methods.description: Moves focus to the previous note in the list.

methods.name: onDown
methods.description: Moves focus to the next note in the list.

methods.name: _moveFocus
methods.description: Internal method to change focus based on direction (up/down).
